sqlMap.select:
select t.user_id, t.user_name, t.org_no, t.dep_code, t.mobile, t.email, t.mobile2, t.status, t.crt_time, t.remark, s.org_name, s.org_name_1st, s.org_name_2nd, s.org_name_3rd, s.org_name_4th from t_setp_user t left join t_sys_org_info s on t.org_no=s.org_no where 1=1
and t.mobile='$mobile$'
and t.pwd='$pwd$'
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_setp_logon ( user_id, logdate, result, remark ) values( '$user_id$', sysdate, '$result$', '$remark$' )
insert into t_setp_number ( user_id, setp_num, deal_time, remark1, remark2 ) values( '$user_id$', '$setp_num$', to_date('$deal_time$','yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss'), '$remark1$', '$remark2$' )
sqlMap.delete: delete from t_setp_number t where t.user_id = '$user_id$' and to_char(t.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') = to_char(to_date('$deal_time$','yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyymmdd')
sqlMap.select:
select '【'||c.org_name_3rd||'】: '||b.user_name user_name,/*姓名*/ sum(a.setp_num) setp_num,/*步数*/ rank() over(order by sum(a.setp_num) desc nulls last) rank1,/*分行中排名*/ rank() over(partition by c.org_no order by sum(a.setp_num) desc nulls last) rank2/*部门中排名*/ from t_setp_number a,t_setp_user b,t_sys_org_info c where a.user_id=b.user_id and b.org_no=c.org_no
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') = '$stat_date$'/*日*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'day'),'yyyymmdd') and to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'day')+6,'yyyymmdd')/*周*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymm') = substr('$stat_date$',1,6)/*月*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'Q'),'yyyymmdd') and to_char(add_months(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'Q'), 3) - 1,'yyyymmdd')/*季*/
and to_char(a.deal_time,'yyyy') = substr('$stat_date$',1,4)/*年*/
and c.org_no_2nd in(select t.org_no_2nd from t_sys_org_info t where t.org_no='$org_no$') --参数，当前登录人的组织机构编码 group by c.org_name_3rd, b.user_name, c.org_no

select t.org_name,/*部门*/ round(t.avg_setp_num,0) setp_num,/*人均步数*/ t.rank1/*排名*/ from (select a.org_no, a.org_name, a.p_org_no, a.disp_no, case when count(distinct c.user_id)=0 then 0 else sum(nvl(c.setp_num,0))/count(distinct c.user_id) end avg_setp_num, rank() over(order by case when count(distinct c.user_id)=0 then 0 else sum(nvl(c.setp_num,0))/count(distinct c.user_id) end desc nulls last) rank1 from t_sys_org_info a left join t_setp_user b on a.org_no=b.org_no left join t_setp_number c on b.user_id=c.user_id
and to_char(c.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') = '$stat_date$'/*日*/
and to_char(c.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'day'),'yyyymmdd') and to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'day')+6,'yyyymmdd')/*周*/
and to_char(c.deal_time,'yyyymm') = substr('$stat_date$',1,6)/*月*/
and to_char(c.deal_time,'yyyymmdd') between to_char(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'Q'),'yyyymmdd') and to_char(add_months(trunc(to_date('$stat_date$','yyyymmdd'), 'Q'), 3) - 1,'yyyymmdd')/*季*/
and to_char(c.deal_time,'yyyy') = substr('$stat_date$',1,4)/*年*/
where a.org_no_2nd=(select t.org_no_2nd from t_sys_org_info t where t.org_no='$org_no$')/*参数，当前登录人的组织机构编码*/ group by a.org_no, a.org_name, a.p_org_no, a.disp_no ) t connect by prior t.org_no=t.p_org_no start with t.p_org_no=(select t.org_no_2nd from t_sys_org_info t where t.org_no='$org_no$')/*参数，当前登录人的组织机构编码*/ order by t.disp_no,t.org_no
sqlMap.update: update t_setp_user t set t.pwd='$new_pwd$' where user_id='$user_id$'
